name: Simple Arcade Racing
description:
The idea of the game was a arcade racing game where you could pick your car, customize and upgrade it and so on. Unfortunately I only had one day to do anything. 

Thanks to this game jam I finally tried Godot which makes me very happy. I will continue to play with it because the engine seems very interesting and I had fun making this 'game'.

Assets: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/racing-pack
